dialog.speaker: CliveLumbergh (Male)
dialog.utterance: Whoa, now! And just what do you figure you are doing up here?

dialog.speaker: CliveLumbergh (Male)
dialog.utterance: These are my private quarters, friend. I don't allow tours up here. Don't allow tours ever, on deeper consideration.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Seems I caught you off guard.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'm not here for a tour.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You've got blood on your shirt. Right... there. No, lower.

dialog.speaker: CliveLumbergh (Male)
dialog.utterance: Untrue. I merely did not expect a visitor in my private chambers. Where I expect solitude while I slaughter them who disobey - ahem. While I butcher my dinner.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Dinner of what?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Sorry to disturb you.

dialog.speaker: CliveLumbergh (Male)
dialog.utterance: I do own a factory known for specializing in the canning of boarstwurst. On occasion, I like to imbibe other parts of the cystypig.

dialog.speaker: CliveLumbergh (Male)
dialog.utterance: Did you fancy me a cannibal? Perish the thought. No, I don't eat the bodies I disappear. A joke, that last was.

dialog.speaker: CliveLumbergh (Male)
dialog.utterance: So. What can I do for you? My full attention is at your disposal.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: SubLight sent me to kill you. But I'm sure we can work something out.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I should go.

dialog.speaker: CliveLumbergh (Male)
dialog.utterance: By SubLight, you mean Catherine, do you not? That greedy star-crossed sow.

dialog.speaker: CliveLumbergh (Male)
dialog.utterance: Listen, friend. The Boarst King of Monarch does not negotiate with coveters. How about you bring me Catherine's severed head, and I will gift you a lifetime supply of boarst.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Good deal. I'll kill Catherine for you.

dialog.speaker: CliveLumbergh (Male)
dialog.utterance: Oh, the King will make it awful worth your while. In fact, he would fancy to mount her head right above his desk.

dialog.speaker: CliveLumbergh (Male)
dialog.utterance: Make it so. And make it swift. And the King shall reward you with a mountain of cysty-flesh like you cannot believe.

dialog.speaker: CliveLumbergh (Male)
dialog.utterance: Apology considered. Whether accepted is yet to be determined.

dialog.speaker: CliveLumbergh (Male)
dialog.utterance: Intrusions - and infractions - really quicken me with anger.

dialog.speaker: CliveLumbergh (Male)
dialog.utterance: Right. On account of - ahem - seeing as I ain't ever approved one. So, as my way of saying welcome, I must ask you.

dialog.speaker: CliveLumbergh (Male)
dialog.utterance: What in the blackest hole would possess you to traipse into my office? Uninvited. Unannounced. Propelled, no doubt, by some form of death wish.

dialog.speaker: CliveLumbergh (Male)
dialog.utterance: Certain things require a mess to do well. See, I was just killing... some time. I prefer to prepare my dinner by my own hand. Nothing like fresh and bloody... boarstwurst.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Those parts are from cystypigs?
